# sux-responsive-media



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                                                        | Type                   | Default   |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | --------- |
| `aspectRatio` | `aspect-ratio` | The aspect ratio of the Responsive media in the format of `width:height`, e.g. `16:9`, `4:3`, or `1:1`. Ratios not in this format will be ignored. | `string`               | `'16:9'`  |
| `fit`         | `fit`          | Determines how content will be resized to fit its container.                                                                                       | `"contain" \| "cover"` | `'cover'` |
